spring.description: Blooming parks and mild weather make outdoor walks enjoyable.

public_transport_tips.tip: Trains connect Roskilde with Copenhagen in about 25 minutes.

cities.name: Skagen

spring.description: Increasing daylight and fresh coastal air attract artists and photographers.

autumn.description: Fewer visitors and dramatic skies over the sea.

public_transport_tips.tip: Trains connect Skagen with Frederikshavn and the rest of Denmark.
